snippet: At many of the city’s best restaurants, popular dishes are available in a takeout version — if you go get them yourself.
abstract: Florence Fabricant Front Burner column notes that many of New York City's best restaurants offer some of their specialties in takeout version, but they do not deliver.
lead_paragraph: At many of the city’s best restaurants, popular dishes are available in a takeout version — if you go get them yourself.

headline.print_headline: Some of New York’s Signature Dishes Are Yours to Take Out
headline.main: Some of New York’s Signature Dishes Are Yours to Take Out
